document_data.name: Hailcone
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hailcone''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used to create dangerous shards of hail. This spell was created by the [[wizard]] [[Aubayreer]].
document_data.Effects: This spell caused large bits of hail to rain down into the area of effect. The shards originated roughly {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} above the area and rained down to strike anything within a {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} cone beneath them.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a pinch of dust and several drops of water to cast.
